talents.option2: +1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

abilities.desc: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 30% of the damage.DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.notes: The pulses stop if Slark dies.

abilities.desc: Slark leaps forward, leashing the first hero he connects with and applying Essence Shift Stacks.  That unit can only move a limited distance away from Slark\'s landing position.
abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.notes: Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location.

abilities.desc: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1 Agility.
abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.notes: To permanently steal Agility, Slark doesn't need to land the killing blow, as long as the enemy hero is killed within 300 range of Slark while having the Essence Shift debuff.

abilities.desc: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.
abilities.name: Depth Shroud

abilities.desc: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.notes: The passive movement and health regeneration bonuses have a [0, 0, 0] second activation and deactivation delay.
